ygData.subject: Re: Kill Stealing
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Er. Absolutely not! This would prevent someone from helping someone who has gotten in over their head by taking the critter off their back as they run. It
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, 3 Aug 1999, Lanadina the Magician wrote:

> From: "Lanadina the Magician" <lanadina@...>
>
> I completely agree with you. Verant needs to fix the coding on this, to make
> sure that the group gets the kill...or...whoever attacks the MOB first gets
> the kill. Its very very disheartening to camp something for hours and hours
> with your group, just to have a wizard or other high level spell casting
> class come along and take it with one shot.

Er. Absolutely not!
This would prevent someone from helping someone who has gotten in
over their head by taking the critter off their back as they run.

It would also make it EASIER to killsteal by someone. Just run in
and get the first hit in andit doesn't matter who has been camping there.

===================================================
Sarah sarah@...
===================================================
My picture of the world is of masses of people extending gifts to other
people, doing favors -- but nobody keeping score. -- Dr. Whitsett
===================================================
